title: p4est 2.3.1 fails to build on RHEL
body:
p4est build fails.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install -j30 --only dependencies dealii
```

This is the top level error

```
libtool: compile:  /home/c.praveen_052/Applications/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512/gcc-8.3.0/mpich-3.4.1-ufau2ub53s75hutxdrtb7qbm4ctqf5qx/bin/mpicc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I./config -I./src -I./iniparser -I./libb64 -DSC_LOG_PRIORITY=SC_LP_ESSENTIAL -O2 -MT src/libsc_la-sc_containers.lo -MD -MP -MF src/.deps/libsc_la-sc_containers.Tpo -c src/sc_containers.c -o src/libsc_la-sc_containers.o >/dev/null 2>&1
src/sc_v4l2.c: In function 'sc_v4l2_device_format':
src/sc_v4l2.c:276:10: error: 'struct v4l2_pix_format' has no member named 'ycbcr_enc'
   vd->pix->ycbcr_enc = V4L2_YCBCR_ENC_DEFAULT;
          ^~
src/sc_v4l2.c:276:24: error: 'V4L2_YCBCR_ENC_DEFAULT' undeclared (first use in this function); did you mean 'V4L2_PRIORITY_DEFAULT'?
   vd->pix->ycbcr_enc = V4L2_YCBCR_ENC_DEFAULT;
                        ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
                        V4L2_PRIORITY_DEFAULT
src/sc_v4l2.c:276:24: note: each undeclared identifier is reported only once for each function it appears in
src/sc_v4l2.c:277:10: error: 'struct v4l2_pix_format' has no member named 'quantization'
   vd->pix->quantization = V4L2_QUANTIZATION_DEFAULT;
          ^~

```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2400-42af3c1
* **Python:** 3.7.3
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512
* **Concretizer:** original


<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

```console
packages:
   hdf5:
      variants: +fortran +cxx +hl
   petsc:
      variants: +mumps +suite-sparse +p4est
   dealii:
      variants: ~python
   trilinos:
      variants: +rol
   all:
      providers:
         mpi: [mpich]
```

### Additional information

 * [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6384520/spack-build-env.txt)
 * [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6384515/spack-build-out.txt)


@davydden

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
